[All Items (Use for Test Only!)]
0057ECF8 00000077

C0000000 00000008

DC000000 00000008
D1000000 00000000
{Nothing but spagetti code. This will Delete some action commands, and cause softlocks so DON'T SAVE!}

[ITEM TEST 1 (don't touch)]
C0000000 00000001
2057EFC8 0000007F
2057EFCD 00000063
D1000000 00000000
D2000000 00000000
{Changing these values may bring you any item (0057ECF8)= Starting offset for entire list (77)=first item}
